reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 454/09: PRESCRIBED TEMPORARY INDEXING FACTOR
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 454/09: PRESCRIBED TEMPORARY INDEXING FACTOR

content.content: 1. (1) For the purposes of subsections 51 (5) and 52 (1.3) of the Act, a temporary indexing factor of 0.5 per cent shall be applied for 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015 and 2016.  O. Reg. 454/09, s. 1; O. Reg. 405/10, s. 1; O. Reg. 140/12, s. 1; O. Reg. 251/14, s. 1; O. Reg. 340/15, s. 1 (1). (2) For the purposes of subsections 51 (5) and 52 (1.3) of the Act, a temporary indexing factor of 1 per cent shall be applied for 2017. O. Reg. 340/15, s. 1 (2).
content.raw_html:
1. (1) For the purposes of subsections 51 (5) and 52 (1.3) of the Act, a temporary indexing factor of 0.5 per cent shall be applied for 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013, 2014, 2015 and 2016.  O. Reg. 454/09, s. 1; O. Reg. 405/10, s. 1; O. Reg. 140/12, s. 1; O. Reg. 251/14, s. 1; O. Reg. 340/15, s. 1 (1).

(2) For the purposes of subsections 51 (5) and 52 (1.3) of the Act, a temporary indexing factor of 1 per cent shall be applied for 2017. O. Reg. 340/15, s. 1 (2).

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 454/09, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 454/09, s. 2.
